document.full_text: thousands of red-shirted anti-government protesters gathered on sunday in bangkok's old quarter to mark the one-year anniversary of a violent confrontation with the military in which 26 people were killed and more than 800 wounded.
document.title: thousands of thai "red shirts" commemorate bangkok unrest
lines_and_colors: thousands of red-shirted anti-government protesters gathered on sunday in bangkok's old quarter to mark the one-year anniversary of a violent confrontation with the military in which 26 people were killed and more than 800 wounded.
